Package android.speech.srec

Simple, synchronous SREC speech recognition API.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
MicrophoneInputStream PCM input stream from the microphone, 16 bits per sample.
Recognizer Simple, synchronous speech recognizer, using the Nuance SREC package.
UlawEncoderInputStream InputStream which transforms 16 bit pcm data to ulaw data.
WaveHeader This class represents the header of a WAVE format audio file, which usually have a .wav suffix.
 

Package android.speech.srec Description

Simple, synchronous SREC speech recognition API.
